thread.title: Kunde

author: Kunde
title: Kunde
text: There aren't many items available on the dutch version of amazon, at least, not the ones I want to buy. The german amazon is a great solution and getting the giftcards through this site is a fast and easy way. There will be service costs, but compared to the dutch sites it's a lot better since there are also â‚¬15 gift cards, and others that the dutch sites somehow don't have...
